HeadStart update and Starbucks Invite
Good Afternoon {!Contact.FirstName},
Have you been Volunteering?
YES?
Well done! make sure and log your hrs on the Headstart Website HERE using the log in details above
If you don't log your voluteering hours we cant invite you to the job interview!
NOT YET?
What's the hold up! You still have 5 WEEKS to get started and do 16hrs to qualify for a job interview. Loads of time!
If you need a help finding a placement let us know we have great guidance and advice for how to get you started:
headstart@the-challenge.org
Next Workshop and Recruitment Process
Two workshops down, two to go! It all starts to get serious now and there are three remaining steps to the Starbucks recruitment process. This starts with two exciting workshops that will tell you everything you need to know about your upcoming interview and some great communication coaching that will be invaluable for any future interview you may attend. Next steps... Last Chance to Attend Workshop 2 If you missed out on attending the Customer Service in Action workshop there are still spaces available at the following workshop so sign up here: 25th August 0900 - 1100 25th August 11.30 - 13.15
Workshop 3 and Workshop 4
Book your place on the Starbucks Compulsory Workshop and AGL Communications Coaching using the link below: 29th August: 0900-1200 29th August: 1300-1600 Interview Date Reminder Once you have attended these final workshops it is then down to you to complete your 16 hours! Once you have done this, you will then be sent an invite to your Starbucks Regional Interview taking place over a 2 week period from Monday the 27th September. A reminder of this and other key dates are below:
Week beginning Monday 27th September (evenings): Interview and Assessment Day Week beginning Monday 12th October (evenings): Starbucks On Job Experience (OJE) - to take place in a local store (if you are successful at interview stage) Monday October 26th: Your potential start date as a Starbucks Barista!
Thank you for choosing Starbucks as your prefered job choice. The chance to change preferance has now past.
If you have any further questions please go get in contact with us. Otherwise, keep clocking up those volunteering hours and get yourself booked on your workshops as soon as possible! We look forward to seeing you all next week!
Any questions? Email the HeadStart team, check out our website or get in touch on facebook.
